channel.title: Silly Contrived ToL Matches
channel.description:
ToL has a lot of interesting interactions between various classes and they can make for some silly scenarios. For example, it's technically possible for BD to win on Day 2 without any executions. Here are a few fun ones I've come up with so far:
[details="Code Name: Dogpile"] ## Requires 2x Knight Sorc Inq Alch/Merc Alch/Merc 2x Phys MM Assassin Sage Hunter King
## Timeline
_**Night 1**_ Assassin attacks Prince
_**Night 2**_ Assassin attacks Phys(1) Phys(1) rezzes Prince
_**Day 3**_ Assassin Poisons CW
_**Night 3**_ MM Converts CW Hunter Wolfs CW Phys(2) rezzes Phys(1)
_**Day 4**_ Phys(2) vote up Merc’s targets (if any are present)
_**Night 4**_ Sorceror uses Circle of Death on Phys(2) Knights uses Cold Steel on Phys(2) Inq uses Ruthless Efficiency on Phys(2) Alchs/Mercs use Poison/Rebound on Phys(2) Assassin uses Assassinate on Phys(2)
DKs use Cold Steel on Sage Hunter uses Wolf on Sage King uses Execute on Sage
Sage swaps Phys(2) & Self
On Night 4 the Sage will bleed out, die from poisoning, be attacked by a wolf and then murdered 10 extra times, just to be sure. In the morning you will see it announced that the King ordered his execution, and _boy did he_.
I think, in theory, you can get something similar using a possessor and running the Sage into a Hunter bear and having 2 mercs + 1 alch or vice-versa. [/details]
[details="Code Name: Everyone Dies"] ## Requires Prince King Sorcerer Inquisitor Cult Leader Ritualist Alch 9x Non-occupy immune BD (Princess/Knight/Paladin/Observer/Noble)
## Timeline
_**Night 1**_ Nobody dies
_**Day 2**_ Cult Leader bleeds Inquisitor
_**Night 2**_ Nothing happens
_**Night 3**_ Sorcerer uses Circle of Death on Prince Cult Leader uses Eradicate on Prince & King King uses Order Execution on Sorcerer Ritualist swaps Ritualist & Alch BD visit Prince Inquisitor stabs Alch Alch bombs Ritualist
This means:
Prince and King die to Cult Leader BD + Cult Leader die to CoD Ritualist dies to Inq Alch dies to self-bomb Sorcerer dies to Order Execution Inq bleeds out
And everyone is dead on N3. The best part is this could _actually_ happen in a game! [/details]
As I think of more, I'll update this thread.
[details="Update Log"] - Added Dogpile + Everyone Dies [/details]

item.title: Silly Contrived ToL Matches
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It’s possible for Unseen to have majority of votes D2 with no deaths.

Merc on MM
Merc on assassin
Evil King
Sorcerer
Aristocrat
MM
Assassin

That’s 9 votes which is the required number to vote someone up

After which 2 of the BD won’t be able to vote so you only need 1 person to not Pardon and you have majority immediately. (Unfortunately you cannot also have a Fool or Scorned to be that one person because Inquisitor is taking the final Neut slot)
